dialogue.text: Hey, are you alright? You totally shut down during your conversation
I know…I’m so stupid, I should just go…this was a terrible idea, I made you look like a fool…I’m so sorry.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, it’s okay! Didn’t you hear what Boss had to say? They can make your dreams come true!
…I just don’t know what to do. I always freeze up when I try to talk to anyone…How am I even going to sing!…Wait…Did I say that I already have a band?
Let’s just focus on one thing at a time…firstly, no more crazy caffeinated, overly sweetened coffee. Try this instead…
